trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all toolbox items associated with an activity in a workflow designer.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All toolbox items associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class are derived from ActivityToolboxItem.

This class displays a graphical representation of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class in the toolbox of a design-time environment and creates an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class it is associated with when a user drags it onto the design surface.
The activity toolbox item typically represents an activity to create when invoked on a design-mode document.
This class inherits directly from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"></xref> class.
The default constructor for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"></xref> class that creates the specified type of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> component.
The type of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the toolbox item will create.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
When ActivityToolboxItem is called, it deserializes the toolbox item.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds information to deserialize the toolbox item.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that provides the deserialization context for the toolbox item.

Creates an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> component or an array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> components when the toolbox item is invoked.
The CreateComponentsCore method returns the component or components that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem> creates.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> to host the toolbox item.
An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.

Creates an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> component or an array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> components that generate a dialog box on the design surface when the toolbox item is invoked.
Activity designer developers can override this method to display a dialog box when the toolbox item is dragged onto the design surface.
Unless overridden, this method has the same behavior as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> to host the toolbox item.
An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
Gets the associated display name for the Toolbox item in the Toolbox.
The type of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to retrieve the display name for.
String representing the display name for the Toolbox item
Gets the associated Image that is used to represent the Toolbox item in the Toolbox.
The type of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to retrieve the Toolbox image for.
Image object displayed in the Toolbox for a Toolbox item
